cab.content: Military Secret. 927From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,Ust May 1919.(Received 1st June 1919.)Clear the line. 7420. 31st May.No. 20. , Part I. Parachinar reports Khoidad Khel section Zaimukhts joining Afghans. This is not yet confirmed from other sources. Massozai claim of Orakzais unsuccessfully attacked Badarna picket near Sadda in some forces. No further developments Miranshah where the Wazirs appear to be awaiting Afghan support before undertaking serious operations. Mahsud lashkars reported Jandola. Manjhi post south of Murtaza attacked unsuccessfully night 29th-30th.Part II. Fighting continues at Lakka Tiga, but ceased at Kaharlachiand Peiwar. All well at Thai. Reinforcements left Hangu yesterday forTochi. Arrival of aeroplanes at Miranshah said to have eased situation there.
